name: Attract0r
description:
Any composers who would like to make sound for my game welcome.

Attract0r is an arcade-like game I coded in processing3 for fun not for a project or game jam. This is my first major project. I plan on adding more content, and porting over to unity.

All suggestions and criticism is appreciated.
You can watch it here: https://youtu.be/TrdrbBsJePM

I know there should be sound.
I know "A tractor" sounds stupid
